t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There's no way to turn off this spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Is this how things will end? I sentimentally remember all the years before this...

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Some wanted this because they want to marry into royalty...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I guess I'm now a freak like everyone...

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Is your only hope to figure out a way to undo this?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There's a tower near the Youkai Mountain range where you can make yourself normal again...

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm going to go there and make myself normal again.
